title: WP Cloud – The first cloud platform built for WordPress
body:
WP Cloud













Bring world-class WordPress hosting to your customers.

WP Cloud gives you the tools you need to add scalable, highly available, extremely fast WordPress hosting to your product offering. It’s the only cloud platform built from the ground up just for WordPress.



LET’S CONNECT




 







































Minimize Risk

WP Cloud is incredibly secure and comes with the option to include or sell additional client-facing security features, including real-time backups, anti-spam, and malware scanning.


Web Application FirewallDDoS ProtectionHourly database and daily file backupsSSL certificates and TLS traffic encryption












Create Trust

With more than 15 years of experience running hundreds of millions of sites on WordPress.com, the highest-trafficked sites in the world on WPVIP, and the managed WordPress hosting company Pressable, we've built a platform we're proud to put up against any cloud services.


99.999% UptimeHigh availability with automated scalingFull data center redundanciesAutomated failure detection with zero-downtime migration


























































Increase Speed

We’re the only cloud platform team fully dedicated to optimizing WordPress. Your customers will feel the difference with WP Cloud, and you’ll be able to expand to new markets even faster.


Incredibly low page speed indexAutomated WordPress edge cachingBuilt-in CDN4 origin and 24 edge global data centers

Build More

WP Cloud is completely API-driven and ready to integrate directly under your platform. Your customers get the fantastic experience they’ve come to expect from you and the speed and security of a WordPress-first cloud. 


Eliminate costly server platform softwareBring your own interface and revenue modelsDeploy new WordPress environments in secondsProvide fully integrated staging environments


















One Focus.

While AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are focused on one-size-fits-all solutions for customers across industries, WP Cloud is the best solution for WordPress-centric hosting companies like yours.










We built WP Cloud so every hosting company can provide the safest and fastest WordPress experience available.
 





	              Matt Mullenweg, co-founder of WordPress
